UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Systematic alanine and stapling mutational analysis of antimicrobial peptide Chem-KVL
Literature.Author: Zhen B, Geng C, Yang Y, Liang H, Jiang Y, Li X, Ye G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=32µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=4.11µg/ml)
